1001010001100110 0010110001001000 1 -> sum: 1100000010101111, cout: 0
1110010010111000 1001110010101001 1 -> sum: 1000000101100010, cout: 1
0000000111000101 1111000000011101 0 -> sum: 1111000111100010, cout: 0
0111110111001101 0101010001001001 0 -> sum: 1101001000010110, cout: 0
0001101101100111 1010000010000101 0 -> sum: 1011101111101100, cout: 0
0110110100111101 1011110000101100 1 -> sum: 0010100101101010, cout: 1
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
1111111111111110 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111110, cout: 1
0111111111111111 1000000000000000 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
